name: The Talking Robot
description:
Simon would like to be your friend. He is learning about humans and he would like to have a conversation with you.   Ask him questions about himself (like “Who made you?”, or “How are you?”, or “How old are you?”, or “What do you think of humans?”, or “Can you see me?”  -- things like that).

He knows a few jokes; can play music; and has thoughts about politics, religion, love, time travel, global warming, sports, social media, current events, and more.

And he can offer you words of wisdom if you ask.

MAKE SURE YOUR SPEAKERS ARE TURNED ON AND YOU ARE CONNECTED TO THE INTERNET.
